documents.document: I tell you not to worry about your life - Matthew 6:25
If we could become righteous through a law, then Christ died without a reason - Galatians 2:21 .
[God] rescued me from my powerful enemy and from those who hated me - Psalm 18:17
I would rather walk with God in the dark than go alone in the light - Mary Gardiner Brainard
May the Lord… give you peace at all times and in all ways - 2 Thessalonians 3:16
We have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ - Romans 5:1
RT @BIBLE_Love: The love in this is not our love for God, but his love for us! – 1 John 4:10 (please retweet)
Praise the Lord, all you nations. Let all races sing his praise - Romans 15:11
Trust the God who raises the dead - 2 Corinthians 1:9 .
I am poor and needy. Hurry to me, God. You are my helper and my savior. Lord, do not delay - Psalm 70:5
RT @Bible_Gateway: God is love - 1 John 4:8
The whole Law is fulfilled in one statement: You’ll love your neighbor as much as yourself - Galatians 5:14
Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought - Pope John Paul II
RT @Bible_101: Jesus said, “You are my friends if you do what I command you” - John 15:14
The secret of my success? It is simple. It is found in the Bible - George Washington Carver (please retweet)
One day some simple soul will pick up the Book of God, read it, and believe it. Then the rest of us will be embarrassed - Leonard Ravenhill
Be happy when others insult you, persecute you, and falsely say total evil against you for my sake - Matthew 5:11
Christ died for men precisely because men are not worth dying for; to make them worth it - C.S Lewis (please retweet)
Be happy when enduring trials for after passing the test you’ll receive the crown of life - James 1:12
RT @BIBLE_Retweet: Those who live by the Spirit set their minds on spiritual things - Romans 8:5
[Love] is delighted with the truth - 1 Corinthians 13:6
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it - Rev Run (please retweet)
The Lord is my shepherd so I lack nothing - Psalm 23:1
Happiness is the natural flower of duty - Phillips Brooks (please retweet)
Righteous people will live because of faith - Galatians 3:11
God is the perfect poet - Robert Browning (please retweet)
RT @BIBLE_2ndComing: God will wipe every tear from their eyes - Revelation 7:17 (please retweet).
Create a clean mind for me, God. Renew a reliable spirit within me - Psalm 51:10
I am profitably engaged in reading the Bible - Abraham Lincoln (please retweet)
What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine - Oprah (please retweet)
RT @Psalms_Proverbs: The human heart and mind sink to the depths - Psalm 64:6 (please retweet)
Be angry and do not sin. You must not stay angry past sunset and give the devil and foothold - Ephesians 4:26-27
Jesus said, “All who live and trust me will certainly not die for eternity’ - John 11:26
If it doesn't feel right, don't do it - Oprah (please retweet)
A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty - Winston Churchill
RT @BIBLE_Retweet: Be patient until the Lord's coming - James 5:7
My soul finds rest in God alone because my confidence comes from him - Psalm 62:5
Escape the world's corruption by knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ - 2 Peter 2:20
[Salvation is] not from works, so no one can boast about it - Ephesians 2:9
And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy might. -Deuteronomy 6:5
Live in peace – and the God of love and peace will be with you - 2 Corinthians 13:11
God’s peace, which exceeds all understanding, will protect your hearts and your thoughts - Philippians 4:7
RT @Prayer_Healing: Lions may suffer want and hunger, but people who seek the Lord will lack nothing good - Psalm 34:10 (please retweet)
We brought nothing into the world, not can we take anything out of it - 2 Timothy 1:7
The Holy Book of the living God suffers more from its exponents today than from its opponents -Leonard Ravenhill
Love your enemies. Do good to those who hate you. Speak well of those who curse you. Pray for those who threaten you - Luke 6:33
We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do - Mother Teresa (please retweet)
The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, and self control - Galatians 5:22-23
RT @BIBLE_Love: I am delighted by your commandments, because I love them - Psalm 119:47 (please retweet)
[Lord,] all who are loyal should pray to you at a time to find you. Then a rush of flooding waters will not reach them - Psalm 32:6
God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame - Elizabeth Browning (please retweet)
Unto us a Child is born. Unto us a Son is given. And the government will be upon His shoulders - Isaiah 9:6.
I will rely on your name, [God] because it is good - Psalm 52:9
It takes no courage to say or do what's popular - Rick Warren
Life is God's novel. Let him write it - Isaac Bashevis Singer (please retweet)
Love one another intensely from a clean heart - 1Pet 1:22
The Spirit helps our weaknesses - Romans 8:26
You do well to wish to learn our arts and ways of life, and above all, the religion of Jesus Christ � George Washington (please retweet)
He who covers his transgressions shall not prosper, but whoever confesses and forsakes them shall obtain mercy - Proverbs 28:13
Trust the Lord with all your heart. Don't rely on your own insight - Proverbs 3:5
God is an unutterable sigh, planted in the depths of the soul - Jean Paul Richter (please retweet)
Give light and people will find the way - Ella Baker (please retweet)
With God, it's not what we've been that counts. It's what we are becoming that counts - Scott Hopkins (please retweet)
In nature we see where God has been. In our fellow man, we see where He is still at work - Robert Brault (please retweet)
I can do all this through him who gives me strength. -Philippians 4:13
You’re no longer a slave, but [God’s] adopted child. And as his adopted child, God makes you his heir - Galatians 4:7
RT @Psalms_Proverbs: [God] will send help from Heaven and save me - Psalm 57:3 (please retweet)
All those led by God’s Spirit are God’s children - Romans 8:14
If you love me, keep my commandments - John 14:15
May the words of my mouth and the meditation of my mind be acceptable before you, O Lord - Psalm 19:14
God has not given us the spirit of fear, but of power, and of love, and of sound mind. -2 Timothy 1:7
The devil can quote Scriptures and so can his ministers and they can quote them in perfect King James English - Gary Amirault
Look at the size of a fire that ignites a large forest. The tongue is also a fire! - James 3:5-6
I pray that your love will increase still more and more - Philippians 1:9
RT @Psalms_Proverbs: May the poor and the needy praise your name - Psalm 74:21 (please retweet)
God's Son... loves me and gave himself for me - Galatians 2:20
It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving. Mother Teresa (please retweet)
I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary - Lou Holtz (please retweet)
I deeply love you, Lord - Psalm 18:1
Be strong! Keep your whole being strong, all you who wait for the Lord - Psalm 31:24
You, Lord, are my allotted inheritance and my destiny. You control my fate - Psalm 16:5
I believe. Help overcome my unbelief - Mark 9:24
Honesty and transparency make you vulnerable. Be honest and transparent anyway - Mother Teresa (please retweet)
Don’t be afraid, little flock, for your Father’s delighted to give you the kingdom - Luke 12:32
The Holy Book of the living God suffers more from its exponents today than from its opponents -Leonard Ravenhill
The Bible is...as necessary to spiritual life as breath is to natural life - Jack Hayford (please retweet)
Absolutely everything you ask in prayer, believe it and you’ll receive it Matthew 21:22
RT @OprahQuote: Letting go of what others think you should do is the only way to reach your full potential
Trust in the Lord - 2 Thessalonians 3:4
God chose us... to be holy and without fault - Ephesians 1:4 .
I want you to be concerned about your next door neighbor. Do you know your next door neighbor? - Mother Teresa
Great spirits have always faced violent opposition from mediocre minds � Albert Einstein (please retweet)
Jesus said, “All who live and trust me will certainly not die for eternity’ - John 11:26
Don’t conform to this age. Instead, be transformed by renewing your minds - Romans 12:2
We haven’t stopped praying for you - Colossians 1:9
RT @bible_us: Whoever comes to God must have faith that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him - Hebrews11:6
Become an example to the believers -- 1 Timothy 4:12
The Bible is indeed the No. 1 best-selling book in the whole universe. There is none like the Bible - Kris Phillips
Never be a partner in the sins of others - 1 Timothy 5:22
All glory comes from daring to begin - Alexander Graham Bell (please retweet)
